title: My Wolf Cowboy
description: After having spent her entire life on the Amish settlement, Natalie Miller knows little about the world outside of her rigid, religious community. But she does know all about rules... and the consequences of breaking them.She's been taught all her life that bad boys like Connor are sinful. She knows better. Her attraction to him goes against everything she was taught to believe in, but her body doesn't care. All it takes is one taste of him, and Natalie is hooked.Living in sin? Nothing ever felt so right...
author: Rose Wynters
